comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Aloha Motors' four-story parking rack.  Aloha Motors was located at the intersection of Kalakaua Avenue and Kapiolani Boulevard.  The Hawaii Convention Center (HCC) (completed in 1998) now stands at this location.

comment.author: 31769130@N03
comment._content: Hy, we are using your photo on our blog www.automotivespace.it/auto/fuori-dallacquario/ Many thanks
